title: Incandescent Staff

Main Hand OnlyTopple

Etchings course red-hot through the lenght of this staff, the script of primordial fire writ in flame.

Quarterstaff Versatile

Incandescent Staff is one of the Two-Handed Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Incandescent Staff is a very rare quarterstaff that can be purchased from Quartermaster Talli, at the Last Light Inn, during Act 2. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.). Chara
